name: Ninja Avocado
description:
The game is about a ninja avocado going in to a guacamole factory to rescue his fellows defenseless from certain death.

Your goal is the rescue all of the avocados from the level, each one serves as a checkpoint and restore your life and yours nacshurikens.

Right and Left arrows - move

X - jump

Z - Sword attack

C - Trow nacshurikens

After rescuing all avocados a door will open, there you will find your final challenge (This challenge is the supposedly final boss, but but by the look of things, the boss is immortal, and we did not have time to fix )

Installation:

Just download, unzip and open the executable. On Linux you may have to change the binary file allowing to open as a executable.

Tools used:

Engine - Godot

Art - GIMP and Piskel

Assets used:

https://opengameart.org/content/battle-midi

https://opengameart.org/content/high-tech-lab

Github page https://github.com/SamuelDeboni/Ninja-Avocado
